TitleEnglish: How I Attended an All-Guy's Mixer (2024)
SummaryEnglish: College student Tokiwa gets invited to a mixer by his female classmate Suo. But when he arrives with his friends, they’re greeted by three dazzlingly handsome men?!
Aliases: Gо̄kon ni Ittara Onna ga Inakatta Hanashi
Gоukon ni Ittara Onna ga Inakatta Hanashi
The Story of How I Went to a Mixer and There Were No Women There

1.TitleEnglish: That Time I Went to a Mixer and...
1.SummaryEnglish: A trio of friends — Tokiwa, Asagi, and Hagi — are invited to a mixer by Tokiwa's classmate Suo. However, waiting for them are not three women, but three very handsome men! As the evening continues at the karaoke and arcade, the group slowly warms up to one another.

2.TitleEnglish: That Time I Went to the Bar and...
2.SummaryEnglish: Asagi is invited by fuji to model for her manga. Meanwhile, hagi crosses path with Kohaku on a rainy day and grows flustered seeing her cuteness. A few days after the mixer, Suo invites Tokiwa and Asagi to the cross-dressing bar she and the others work part-time at!

3.TitleEnglish: That Time I Went to an Izakaya and...

4.TitleEnglish: That Time I Went to the Zoo and...

5.TitleEnglish: That Time I Went to a Comic Convention and...

6.TitleEnglish: That Time I Went to Your Place and...

7.TitleEnglish: That Time I Went Camping and...
7.SummaryEnglish: The six friends arrive at a campsite. The gang enjoys a barbecue in the great outdoors.

8.TitleEnglish: That Time I Went to Campus and...

9.TitleEnglish: That Time I Went to a Summer Festival and...

10.TitleEnglish: That Time You Went to My Place and...

11.TitleEnglish: That Time I Went to the Beach and...

12.TitleEnglish: That Time I Went to a Mixer and... (Thought I'd Never Need to Go to Another Mixer Again)
